entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local amount 2 cm except 5 cm in snow squalls. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 27 January 2023
